item.title: Uh-Oh: Account Level Security and Advanced Search
item.description:
I’m continually surprised that even with a decade of training experience, Dynamics GP users still uncover unexpected features. Just recently, during a class, a situation arose concerning account level security and the advanced search within the account lookup window. For those unfamiliar with account level security, sometimes called organizational structures, this Dynamics GP feature allows you to organize users and general ledger accounts according to your company’s structure. This limits which accounts each user can access...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/uh-oh-account-level-security-and-advanced-search/
